text:
e="preserve">Vice-Admiral Iqbal Fazl Quadir (Urdu:اقبال فضل قادر), (died 19 October 2020) was a Pakistani three-star rank admiral in the Navy, diplomat and analyst. He was known for his participation in second war. He was the Ambassador to Iran between 1983 to 1985.
Qadir died on 19 October 2020.
